# :label:label nw.chtb_0298.4 :label:label 2012-11-27T23:label:label :label:label SDL-AMR-09 :label:label
# :label:label It is reported by news media here that on the 31st , the personnel of the Russian Northwest troop headquarters turned over military installations to the local government , submitted a report to Latvian president Ulmanis regarding the completion of troop withdrawal , and then withdrew from Riga to Moscow by plane .

      :label (m2 / media
            :label (n2 / news)
            :label (h / here))
      :label (a / and
            :label (t / turn-12
                  :label (p5 / person
                        :label (h4 / have-org-role-91
                              :label (h2 / headquarters
                                    :label (t2 / troop
                                          :label (c4 / country :label (n3 / name :label "Russia"))
                                          :label (n / northwest)))
                              :label (p2 / personnel)))
                  :label (t4 / thing
                        :label (i / install-01
                              :label (m3 / military)))
                  :label (g2 / government-organization
                        :label (g3 / govern-01
                              :label (l2 / local))))
            :label (s / submit-01
                  :label p5
                  :label (r4 / report-01
                        :label p5
                        :label (c6 / complete-01
                              :label (w / withdraw-01
                                    :label (t3 / troop))))
                  :label (p / person :label (n4 / name :label "Ulmanis")
                        :label (h3 / have-org-role-91
                              :label (c5 / country :label (n5 / name :label "Latvia"))
                              :label (p3 / president))))
            :label (w2 / withdraw-01
                  :label p5
                  :label p5
                  :label (c7 / city :label (n6 / name :label "Riga"))
                  :label (c8 / city :label (n7 / name :label "Moscow"))
                  :label (p4 / plane)
                  :label (t5 / then))

# :label:label nw.chtb_0298.10 :label:label 2012-11-28T20:label:label :label:label SDL-AMR-09 :label:label
# :label:label It is reported that the Russian troops that withdrew from the three Baltic Sea countries will be stationed respectively in the Russian state of Jalininggele , the state of Simolingsike and Yelinia city which is 300 kilometers away from Moscow .

      :label (s2 / station-01

                              :label (s3 / sea :label (n2 / name :label "Baltic" :label "Sea")))))

                  :label (s4 / state :label (n3 / name :label "Jalininggele")
                        :label c3)
                  :label (s5 / state :label (n4 / name :label "Simolingsike"))
                  :label (c5 / city :label (n5 / name :label "Yelinia")
                        :label (r / relative-position
                              :label (c6 / city :label (n6 / name :label "Moscow"))
                              :label (d / distance-quantity :label 300
                                    :label (k / kilometer)))))
            :label (r3 / respective)))
